inclusion.criterion: Biopsy proven head and neck cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Treated with surgery in Edmonton, Alberta
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of sub-clinical hypothyroidism after head and neck surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Head and neck cancer of the thyroid gland, or other subsite involving the thyroid gland
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of radiation therapy and or chemotherapy to the head and neck
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, but symptoms improved with Levothyroxine treatment.
